sentence.Network_en: That was the chrism of love , which love's own crown.
The chrism is on thine head, -- on mine, the dew, --.
sentence.Network_cn: 可怜我, 头上承受 着凉 透的夜露.

PerfectNetExp.abs: chrisma中文是什么意思？_百度知道 ... charisma 是非凡的领导力 chrism 是圣油 christmas 是圣诞节.
傅以「至圣圣油」（chrism）的祭台，成为基督的象征；他在所有受傅的人之上，被称为独一无二的「受傅者」，因为圣父以圣神为 …

list.abs: chrism是什么意思|chrism的中文意思... ... resin chrism ： 松香乳液 chrism cheese ： 奶油奶酪 chrism ： 圣油仪式.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, from medieval Latin crisma, ecclesiastical Latin chrisma, from Greek khrisma 'anointing', from khriein 'anoint'

means.word_mean: 1. a consecrated ointment consisting of a mixture of oil and balsam

auth_sentence.content: Chrismation follows immediately after baptism and is by anointing with holy oil called Chrism.
